definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: There is also a Children's Corner in our zoo.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里还有个儿童乐园。

sentences.english: A sculpture at the Detroit Zoo composed of Bullets and Gold Leaf.
sentences.chinese: 雕塑在底特律动物园组成的子弹和金叶。

sentences.english: It was in the zoo that Xiao Yang met your sister.
sentences.chinese: 小杨昨天是在动物园碰到你妹妹的。

sentences.english: He Song and I went to Beijing Zoo in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 贺松和我去了北京动物园。

sentences.english: Julien: Kim, are there bears at the zoo?
We saw three sheeps in the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 我们在动物园看见三只绵羊。

sentences.english: This signpost tells the way to the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 这个路标说明去动物园的道路。

sentences.english: Zoo spokeswoman Durruty said everyone was "absolutely thrilled" at the sextuplets' birth.
sentences.chinese: 动物园女发言人杜鲁蒂说大家都被六胞胎惊呆了。

sentences.english: This grating was nothing else than a piece of the brass screens with which aviaries are covered in menageries .
sentences.chinese: 这个纱罩只不过是块动物园里供蒙鸟笼用的铜纱。

sentences.english: Candy and his sister are visiting the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 肯迪和他妹妹正在游览动物园。

sentences.english: The children finally nagged the nurse into taking them to the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们终于缠得保姆答应带他们去动物园了。

sentences.english: Huge tiger statue in snow, China Beijing Zoo.
sentences.chinese: 雪巨虎雕像，中国北京动物园。

sentences.english: You need to take No. 101 bus to the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 你需要乘坐101路车去动物园。

sentences.english: I thank the workers of the zoo for taking care of Sulin and her mother.
sentences.chinese: 感谢动物园工作人员对苏琳和他母亲的照顾。

sentences.english: Afterwards you can go to the neighbouring zoo .
sentences.chinese: 嗣后，你可以逛一下附近的动物园。

sentences.english: Tomorrow morning, I'm prepared to play with my friends in the ShenZhen SAR together.
sentences.chinese: 我准备明天早上和我朋友一起去深圳特区动物园玩。

definition: zookeeper/stockman/breeder (of livestock, dogs or poultry etc)
